Class ExpandableBidListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
      • com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla.ExpandableBidListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.ExpandableListAdapter, android.widget.HeterogeneousExpandableList

    public class ExpandableBidListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
    Created by myapplestory on 3/18/2018. this class is responsible for the expandable bids list in view task activity

        groupPosition - which group was clicked
        isExpanded - if it is currently expanded
